New Records: Sunil Chhetri is set to reach his 150th international cap, a milestone in Indian football history.
Key Match Events: Igor Stimac's India aims to break a winless streak and improve their World Cup qualifying journey.
Pre-Game Insights: India is winless in five matches, while Afghanistan has struggled with only one victory in 12 fixtures.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is held at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium in Guwahati, with both teams aiming for crucial victories.
